messages.content: What is the appropriate code to use to log a partial parotidectomy in which you perform an extracapsular dissection?

The appropriate CPT code for a partial parotidectomy with extracapsular dissection, preserving the facial nerve, would be **42415** (Excision of parotid tumor or parotid gland; lateral lobe, with dissection and preservation of facial nerve).

The appropriate CPT code for a partial parotidectomy with extracapsular dissection, preserving the facial nerve, would be **42415** (Excision of parotid tumor or parotid gland; lateral lobe, with dissection and preservation of facial nerve).
what if I traced out the main trunk of the facial nerve?

If you performed a procedure involving the main trunk of the facial nerve, such as decompression or repair, the most appropriate CPT code would be **69955** (Total facial nerve decompression and/or repair). This code covers procedures that may include grafting and is suitable for interventions on the main trunk of the facial nerve.

If you performed a procedure involving the main trunk of the facial nerve, such as decompression or repair, the most appropriate CPT code would be **69955** (Total facial nerve decompression and/or repair). This code covers procedures that may include grafting and is suitable for interventions on the main trunk of the facial nerve.
